item.title: Why Publishing Data on ICE Employees is in the Public Interest
item.description: This was written with Camille Fassett and first appeared on the website of the Lucy Parsons Labs. Motivated by the Trump administrationâ€™s policy of detaining and separating migrant children from their families at the border, artist and developer Sam Lavigne harvested profiles that list Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) as an employer on social network LinkedIn. He made the dataset of all 1595 responsive profiles, which included names, titles, photographs and general locations, available to download on GitHub.
